archimate:Assessment.name: Inconsistent Architecture Skill Level
archimate:Assessment.documentation: This vulnerability relates to known, logged and accepted risks relating to consistent minimum skill levels. Whilst there are some very good architects in some places many architects have no practical understanding of modelling languages, architecture methodologies or working practices. Some named resources with the architect title are technical specialists. In some cases, the knowledge of the fundamentals of architecture are so bad that architects do not even wish to learn.
